column4: Question: i have ubuntu 6.04 installed, downloaded the new release of kubuntu 8.** and when i insert the CD in to the PC and reboot, the only menu option that works is "Boot to First Hard Drive"
burn again the image, i had also this problem, i don't no why :(
this is the third burn, from 2 comuters
then maybe the download was wrong, i think, before you burn somethink to cd, you try it, for example, you can try this boot image in virtualbox
